original_title: Der frühe Regen, der die Spreu abwäscht, bevor der Frühlingsregen einsetzt
overview: The title of this film translates to the Shona word “Gukurahundi,” a cynical euphemism which refers to a series of massacres, executed in wake of Zimbabwe’s liberation. The work unfolds as a mosaic, evoking ghosts in the shape of nationhood and ancestry.
title: The early rains which wash away the chaff before the spring rains
